name: Autumn Catch
description:
Trade your life as an office worker for a life on the pond.

  • Sit back, Relax, Chill on the pond and fish
  • Collect all the the fish, Discover all the species
  • Build up your Combo high score ( Post your high scores below !)

Instructions :

1. Wait patiently until there's a fish pulling on your line 

2.  Press [Space] before it gets away

3. Wait for the right time and press [Space] again to reel it in

4. Press [Enter] to view your collection

Controls :

Action Key 1. Fish Spacebar 2. View Collection Enter

Game created by Charlesthedev in 2 days 

Art & Programming by Charles the dev

Music used by : Saskrotch & Holizna
